settings.subtitle: Independently Validated
settings.title: We did the research, so you don’t have to.
settings.description: 527 Nights of Data, 58 Participants and 6 Scientists.
settings.bottom_text: Smart Nora’s Validation Study was independently designed, conducted, and reported by SleepScore Labs.

settings.study_quote: "Our validation study revealed that Smart Nora can help both snorers and their partners in getting better sleep as a result of decreased snoring."
settings.study_author: Roy Raymann, Ph.D., VP of Sleep Science and Scientific Affairs, SleepScore Labs.

settings.description: Increased ability to sleep through the night.
Fewer times out of bed for any reason.
Increased ability to sleep through the night.
Reduction in perceived disruption of sleep.

settings.heading: The Study Setup
settings.content:
The data in this study was produced using SleepScore technology by ResMed, snoring detection technology by Sleep.ai, and self-report questionnaires. This product validation study was designed to test the effectiveness of Smart Nora.

The research team first confirmed a statistically significant link between Snorers' snoring (measured objectively using the Do I Snore app) and Partners' sleep (measured objectively using the sleep monitoring device S+ by ResMed).

More snoring was associated with poorer sleep among Partners (i.e., longer time to fall asleep, longer time awake during the night, worse sleep efficiency, worse sleep maintenance) before using Smart Nora. This finding was confirmed when including the Smart Nora use period in the analyses.

The study was independently designed, conducted, and reported by the SleepScore Labs. The study was conducted by Sharon Danoff-Burg, PhD, Holly Rus, PhD, Thijs Walbeek, MS, Luis Cruz Martir, BA, Jennifer Kim, BS, Roy Raymann, PhD. The study was concluded in September 2018.

SleepScore Labs is a joint venture between ResMed and Pegasus Capital Advisors L.P, with headquarters in Carlsbad, California, and an office in Dublin, Ireland.

They utilize SleepScore™ technology powered by ResMed™ to provide the most accurate and advanced sleep improvement system for consumers along with data insights, product evaluation tools and technology licensing opportunities for companies developing products and solutions in the sleep industry.
